nodes.text: Brazadann was a planet located in the Outer Rim, and the twin of the planet Oriadann.

Brazadann was created by Christophe Debien and Patrick Bousquet for the ambiguously canon roleplaying scenario "La Légende des Cristaux" which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 76. It was illustrated by Igor Chevalier and Cyrille Daujean.
